mapper.select: select a.* from coin a left join (select * from candlestick_chart where time = #{now}) b on a.id = b.coin_id where b.coin_id is null;

select a.id as id, a.name as name, a.image as image, a.info as info, a.default_price as defaultPrice, a.issue_date as issueDate, a.issue_count as issueCount, a.price as price, a.circulate_count as circulateCount, a.home_link as homeLink, a.white_paper as whitePaper, b.price/c.price*100 as increase24Hours, d.max_price as high, d.min_price as low from coin a left join (select * from candlestick_chart where time = #{today}) b on a.id = b.coin_id left join (select * from candlestick_chart where time = #{yestoday}) c on a.id = c.coin_id left join (select * from candlestick_chart where time = #{now}) d on a.id = d.coin_id where a.is_del = 0 and a.id=#{id}
